blogPost.excerpt: ✨ It's a minimal calendar for 2021 ✨ You'll get 24 PDF files (white & black version) to print and hang on your office's wall.
blogPost.body: ✨ It's a minimal calendar for 2021 ✨ You'll get 24 PDF files (white & black version) to print and hang on your office's wall.
blogPost.title: Minimal Calendar For 2021 - Dark & light, printable calendars for minimal offices
blogPost.author: Jim Raptis

localize.description: ✨这是2021年的最小日历，你将有24个✨文件(黑白版本)打印出来，并挂在办公室的墙上。
localize.tagline: 适用于小型办公室的深色和浅色、可打印的日历

localize.description: ✨這是2021年的最小日曆，你將有24個✨文件(黑白版本)打印出來，並掛在辦公室的牆上。
localize.tagline: 適用於小型辦公室的深色和淺色、可打印的日曆

previous.excerpt: Pizazz helps you engage viewers and capture attention during video meetings in three simple steps - select a background, upload your slides and voila! Pizazz is FREE for the launch!
previous.title: Pizazz - Virtual presentations for Zoom

localize.description: Pizazz通过三个简单的步骤帮助您在视频会议期间吸引观众并吸引注意力-选择背景、上传幻灯片和瞧！PIZAZS的发布是免费的！
localize.tagline: 用于缩放的虚拟演示文稿

localize.description: Pizazz通過三個簡單的步驟幫助您在視頻會議期間吸引觀衆並吸引注意力-選擇背景、上傳幻燈片和瞧！PIZAZS的發佈是免費的！
localize.tagline: 用於縮放的虛擬演示文稿

next.excerpt: Update your phones look with over 4,500 aesthetic icons made by pro designers and trending Dribbble artists. Our iOS app makes it easy to browse aesthetic themes and download any icon you want –from minimal monochromes to Futurama characters. Plus, it’s free!
next.title: Aesthetic Icons App by Icons8 - Personalize your iPhone with clean and modern icon themes

localize.description: 更新您的手机外观超过4500个美学图标，由专业设计师和流行的Dribble艺术家制作。我们的iOS应用程序使浏览美学主题和下载任何你想要的图标变得容易-从最小的单色到未来人物。另外，这是免费的！
localize.tagline: 用干净、现代的图标主题个性化您的iPhone

localize.description: 更新您的手機外觀超過4500個美學圖標，由專業設計師和流行的Dribble藝術家製作。我們的iOS應用程序使瀏覽美學主題和下載任何你想要的圖標變得容易-從最小的單色到未來人物。另外，這是免費的！
localize.tagline: 用乾淨、現代的圖標主題個性化您的iPhone
